statements: SELECT * FROM robot_inventory
SELECT part_name, quantity, location FROM robot_inventory WHERE part_id = 2
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM robot_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse'
SELECT * FROM robot_inventory WHERE part_description LIKE '%sensor%'
SELECT part_name, quantity, location FROM robot_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM robot_inventory
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM robot_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY part_name DESC
SELECT part_id, part_name, location FROM robot_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY part_id
SELECT part_id, part_name, part_description FROM robot_inventory WHERE quantity <= 5 AND location LIKE 'Sh%'
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM robot_inventory WHERE part_name LIKE '%motor%'
SELECT * FROM robot_parts
SELECT part_id, part_name, quantity FROM robot_parts
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM robot_parts ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM robot_components
SELECT component_id, component_name, part_id, quantity FROM robot_components
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM robot_parts WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY part_name ASC
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM robot_components ORDER BY supplier_id DESC, component_name ASC
SELECT * FROM robot_parts INNER JOIN robot_components ON robot_parts.part_id = robot_components.part_id WHERE robot_parts.part_id = 1 AND robot_components.quantity > 5
SELECT part_name AS part, supplier_id AS supplier, quantity FROM robot_parts WHERE part_name LIKE '%motor%'
SELECT component_name, supplier_id FROM robot_components WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM robot_parts;
SELECT part_name, part_category, quantity FROM robot_parts WHERE part_category = 'Mechanical';
SELECT component_name, component_type, quantity FROM robot_components ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT inventory_name, inventory_type, location FROM lab_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT inventory_name, location, last_checked FROM lab_inventory WHERE location LIKE '%Storage%';
SELECT part_name, part_category FROM robot_parts WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY part_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM robot_parts WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND part_category = 'Arm';
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM robot_components GROUP BY component_name HAVING quantity > 5 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM lab_inventory WHERE inventory_type IN ('Chemicals', 'Tools', 'Hardware') AND quantity BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY last_checked ASC;
SELECT part_name, part_category, quantity FROM robot_parts WHERE part_category LIKE 'Leg%' OR part_category LIKE '%Wheel';
SELECT * FROM robot_parts ORDER BY part_name DESC;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM robot_parts WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM component_parts WHERE component_name LIKE '%gear%';
SELECT part_name, location FROM robot_parts WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT technician_name, speciality FROM lab_technicians ORDER BY technician_name ASC;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM robot_parts ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT component_name, quantity, part_name FROM component_parts INNER JOIN robot_parts ON component_parts.part_id = robot_parts.part_id
SELECT technician_name, speciality FROM lab_technicians WHERE speciality='Mechanical' ORDER BY technician_name ASC
SELECT supplier_name, contact_info FROM part_suppliers WHERE contact_info LIKE '%@gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM robot_parts WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY part_name ASC
SELECT * FROM robot_parts;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM robot_parts ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT part_name, location FROM robot_parts WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM components WHERE price < 100.00;
SELECT component_name, manufacturer FROM components ORDER BY component_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM robot_parts WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY part_id DESC
SELECT part_name, location FROM robot_parts WHERE location LIKE '%warehouse%' ORDER BY part_name ASC
SELECT * FROM component_inventory WHERE quantity <= 50 ORDER BY component_id ASC
SELECT component_name, price FROM components WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, assembly_date FROM robot_assembly WHERE assembly_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
